001package org.nasdanika.graph.processor;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.FIELD;
004import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
005import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
006
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.Target;
009
010import org.nasdanika.graph.Connection;
011import org.nasdanika.graph.Node;
012
013/**
014 * Annotation for methods returning an outgoing handler for {@link Node} processors or outgoing handler fields.
015 * Methods may be with zero parameters or with one parameter compatible with {@link Connection}. 
016 * @author Pavel
017 *
018 */
019@Retention(RUNTIME)
020@Target({FIELD, METHOD})
021public @interface OutgoingHandler {
022        
023        /**
024         * If not blank, the value shall be a <a href="https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/5.3.22/reference/html/core.html#expressions">Spring boolean expression</a>
025         * which is evaluated in the context of the outgoing connection. 
026         * @return
027         */
028        String value() default "";
029        
030        /**
031         * Matching priority. Defaults to 0. Higher priorities are matched before lower priorities.
032         * @return
033         */
034        int priority() default 0;
035                
036}
